meanings.definition: To make changes or corrections to (written or printed material)
meanings.sent1: She revises her essay to fix any mistakes.
meanings.sent2: He revises his report before submitting it.
meanings.sent3: The teacher revises the students' papers with a red pen.
meanings.sent4: Like a skilled editor, she revises the article to perfection.
meanings.sent5: The author revises the manuscript until it shines with clarity.

meanings.definition: To review or study material in preparation for an examination or test.
meanings.sent1: He revises his notes before the big test.
meanings.sent2: She revises the textbook to understand the concepts better.
meanings.sent3: The student revises late into the night for the exam.
meanings.sent4: Like a dedicated student, he revises diligently for the quiz.
meanings.sent5: She revises the material until she knows it by heart.
